name: @klippa/nativescript-login
description: The best way to do social logins in NativeScript, a plugin with modern SDKs to allow authentication to various providers with access to all SDK features

scripts.build: yarn install && ts-patch install && yarn run ngcc && yarn run ngc
scripts.build.old: yarn install && ts-patch install && yarn run ngcc && yarn run ngc && yarn run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: yarn install && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: yarn install && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: yarn install && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: yarn install && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: yarn run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @klippa/nativescript-login && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @klippa/nativescript-login && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: yarn run demo.reset && yarn run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && yarn install
